metadata.description:
Peace! You can call me Jack, and I’m an artist from the DMV. My creative style embraces all mediums for the sake of passionate storytelling, transformation, and awakening. Just as I have been finding my way within this world creatively, I can’t help but notice a sense of being found: the absorption into something bigger, more expansive, and often beyond words.

WAYSPACE is the name I’ve given to this bigger dimension of awareness that lies within us, both collectively and individually. It also happens to be the name of my debut album, which was released on Halloween 2022.

This new song, Saw, serves as a prequel to the album. It represents the mess, the breakdown, the disappointment, and the suffering aroused by loss, grief and nostalgia. Saw also reveals a quiet willingness to see the beauty in every difficulty. When we hear the words “Could it be that we’re just on the scenic route? Seeing tears on everybody coming down” we are offered a chance to embrace the suffering and understand that it connects us through compassion.

This was one of the first songs that my closest collaborator, Fabrizio, and I ever made together. Fabrizio is also the main producer on the album, so it means a lot to be able to share a song that is so dear to both of us. I’m grateful that it now has a home right here.

lyrics.text:
i had a dream about us last night
but it’s not what u think
it was something of a celebration of our past life
and that was when i saw the link

cause i saw what i was
i saw what i need
i’m moving a lot
so how can it cease?
i’ll go off the feeling now
i see the ceiling
years of the struggle
will make you the villain

i saw what i was
saw what i need
i’m moving a lot
so how can it cease?
i’ll go off the feeling now
i see the ceiling
years of this struggle
will make u forget it

i tried force the way i think i’m supposed to feel
but i miss my stuffy basement filled with legos
and i miss my ignorance of lack of halos
and i miss my innocence when i was cradled

but what does it mean to miss it
without ever running away?
without ever really completing
that part of my life
because i was unable to face
the growth all out of my comfort zone
they’ve been so ready leave it tho
look at their back as i watch em go
of course i’m the one who would be at home

is that what I want?
is that what i need?
i’m feeling a lot
so how can it cease?

you gave me some wisdom
i froze when u said this:
“you might be growing
but don’t you forget me”

i saw what i was
saw what i need
i’m moving a lot
so how can it cease?

i’ll go off the feeling now
i see the ceiling
years of this struggle
will make u forget it

could it be
that we’re just on the scenic route?
seein tears on everybody comin down
might just feel alone like everybody else
everybody lying if we say “i’m well”

and how can i let go
and then just move along
if i’ve been stuck inside my head
for my whole life it’s not a song
say i’m wrong’s an understatement
wallowing’s my middle name

never fail to drag along
never fail to be in shame
part of my livin is settlin things
i wasn’t built to detach a string

pullin em maybe but i would just cling
reaching for them as i’m feeling us sink
but what does it mean
to be over the brink
what does it mean to see what you could be

but feel like it wasn’t attainable even
if i could be capable i wouldn’t breathe

but could it be that
we’re just on the scenic route?
seein tears on everybody comin down
might just feel alone like everybody else
i just feel alone

Cuz i saw what i was
i saw what i need
i’m moving a lot
so how can it cease?

i’ll go off the feeling now
i see the ceiling
years of the struggle
will make you the villain

i saw what i was
saw what i need
i’m moving a lot
so how can it cease?
i’ll go off the feeling now
i see the ceiling
years of this struggle
will make u forget it

could it be that we’re just
on the scenic route?
seein tears on everybody comin down
might just feel alone like everybody else
everybody lying if we say “i’m well”

could it be that we’re just
on the scenic route
seein tears on everybody comin down
might just feel alone like everybody else
everybody’s lying

metadata.name: Saw #1
metadata.title: Saw
